com.ibm.team.reports.common.service
Interface IReportService

public interface IReportService

Service interface for the Reports component.

Since:
0.6

Method Detail

fetchReportDescriptors

IReportDescriptor[] fetchReportDescriptors(IContributorHandle owner,
                                           IProjectAreaHandle projectArea,
                                           IProcessAreaHandle[] processAreas,
                                           java.lang.String snapshotName,
                                           java.lang.String[] parameters,
                                           int flags)
                                           throws TeamRepositoryException
Fetches report descriptors meeting the parameter criteria.

Parameters:
owner - optional owner of the descriptors.
projectArea - optional projectArea.
processAreas - optional array of process areas.
snapshotName - optional snapshot name;
parameters - optional list of parameter names.
flags - ALL, SHARED or PRIVATE. The default is ALL.
Returns:
the descriptors matching the criteria.
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - if the operation is canceled. Cancellation can occur even if no progress monitor is provided.

fetchMissingSharedReportDescriptors

IReportDescriptor[] fetchMissingSharedReportDescriptors(IProcessAreaHandle processArea)
                                                        throws TeamRepositoryException
Fetches report descriptors missing from the given process area.

Parameters:
processArea - given process area.
Returns:
the descriptors matching the criteria.
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - if the operation is canceled. Cancellation can occur even if no progress monitor is provided.

Parameters:

Returns:
Throws:

fetchReportDescriptor

IReportDescriptor fetchReportDescriptor(java.lang.String projectAreaId,
                                        java.lang.String reportId)
                                        throws TeamRepositoryException
Fetch a report descriptor from the repository given its project area, report id or item id. If many descriptors satisfy the condition a TeamRepositoryException will be thrown.

Parameters:
projectAreaId - optional projectArea name or UUID.
reportId - the id or UUID of report to fetch
Returns:
report descriptor of the given report identified by the given name.
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
ReportDescriptorConflictException - if a single report descriptor could not be fetched
ItemNotFoundException - if the item was not found
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - if the operation is canceled. Cancellation can occur even if no progress monitor is provided.

fetchQueryDescriptors

IReportQueryDescriptor[] fetchQueryDescriptors(IContributorHandle owner,
                                               IProjectAreaHandle projectArea,
                                               IProcessAreaHandle[] processAreas,
                                               IReportDescriptorHandle report,
                                               IFolderDescriptorHandle folder,
                                               int flags)
                                               throws TeamRepositoryException
Fetch query descriptors meeting the parameter criteria.

Parameters:
owner - optional owner of the descriptors.
projectArea - optional projectArea.
processAreas - optional array of process areas.
report - optional report.
folder - optional folder.
flags - ALL, SHARED, PRIVATE or STARTUP. The default is ALL.
Returns:
the descriptors matching the criteria.
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - if the operation is canceled. Cancellation can occur even if no progress monitor is provided.

saveQueryDescriptor

IFolderDescriptorHandle saveQueryDescriptor(IReportQueryDescriptor descriptor,
                                            boolean sharedIfNullFolder)
                                            throws TeamRepositoryException
Save the given query descriptor.

Parameters:
descriptor - the query descriptor to save
sharedIfNullFolder - controls where the query descriptor will be saved if folder attribute is null
Returns:
The folder that the query descriptor was added to
Throws:

TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - if the operation is canceled. Cancellation can occur even if no progress monitor is provided.

getDefaultProcessArea

                                         IContributorHandle contributor)
                                         throws TeamRepositoryException
Fetch the default process area for a given project area and contributor.

Parameters:
projectArea - the projectArea
contributor - the contributor
Returns:
the default process area; or null
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - if the operation is canceled. Cancellation can occur even if no progress monitor is provided.

getDefaultQueryDescriptor

IReportQueryDescriptorHandle getDefaultQueryDescriptor(IContributorHandle contributor,
                                                       IProjectAreaHandle projectArea)
                                                       throws TeamRepositoryException
Return the default query descriptor for the given contributor, or null if there is no default query descriptor. If there is a default query descriptor associated with the user, return that. If not, iterate through the team areas of which the user is a member. The first one that has a default query descriptor is used. The order of iteration is non-deterministic. If neither the user nor any team areas of which the user is a member have default query descriptors, return null.

Parameters:
contributor -
Returns:
the default query descriptor for the logged in contributor
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - if the operation is canceled. Cancellation can occur even if no progress monitor is provided.

IReportDescriptorHandle getDefaultReportDescriptor(IProjectAreaHandle projectArea)
                                                   throws TeamRepositoryException
Return the default report descriptor for the given project area, or null if there is no default report descriptor.

Parameters:
projectArea - the project area
Returns:
the default report descriptor for the project area
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - if the operation is canceled. Cancellation can occur even if no progress monitor is provided.
Since:
0.7

resolveVariables

java.lang.String[] resolveVariables(IProjectAreaHandle projectArea,
                                    int flags,
                                    java.lang.String[] values)
                                    throws TeamRepositoryException
Resolve the given variable.

Parameters:
projectArea - the project area; must not be null
flags - the parameter flags; see FieldFlags
values - the parameter values; must not be null
Returns:
the resolved values; never null
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - if the operation is canceled. Cancellation can occur even if no progress monitor is provided.

doesReportDescriptorExist

boolean doesReportDescriptorExist(IProjectAreaHandle projectArea,
                                  java.lang.String reportId)
                                  throws TeamRepositoryException
Return whether a report descriptor with the given reportId exists in the given project area.

Parameters:
projectArea - the project area; must not be null
reportId - the id (not itemId) of the report descriptor to search for
Returns:
whether or not the given report descriptor exists
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - if the operation is canceled. Cancellation can occur even if no progress monitor is provided.

                          throws TeamRepositoryException

TeamRepositoryException - if the operation fails for any other reason
